utrition/health component transfer for Familias en Acción is US$ 17/month per 
mother, independent of the number of children in the household, which is equivalent to 
approximately 24% of total household expenditure ( 12). Conditions for receipt of the transfer 
include regular health visits and growth monitoring. 
Evaluation data of Familias en Acción has demonstrated an increase in HAZ score of 0.161
